text: Pinsiam Sor.Amnuaysirichoke (ปิ่นสยาม ส.อำนวยศิริโชค) is a Thai Muay Thai fighter living in Japan since 2009.https://efight.jp/playermeikan-20140630_33791 ==Titles and accomplishments== * 2014 MA Japan Kick Featherweight Championhttps://efight.jp/result-20140119_27285 * 2007 Lumpinee Stadium 122 lbs Champion * 2004 Lumpinee Stadium 118 lbs Championhttps://titlehistories.com/kickboxing/as/tha/lumpinee/lumpinee-b.html * 2004 Lumpinee Stadium Fighter of the Year * Omnoi Stadium 118 lbs Champion * 2002 Isuzu Cup Champion ==Fight record== {|
